data.name: Lulu's Temple
data.detailed_description:
New game:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1287040/Gun_Devil


About the Game

Lulu’s Temple challenges you to venture inside a deep horrifying pyramid, filled with dangerous foes, traps and mysteries.
Play as a badass archeologist who foolishly traps himself inside the temple by stumbling his way in. Use your powerful gun to blast the undead, and torch to light your path ahead.


Features:
  • Horrifying egyptic adventure filled with undead lurking in the dark.
  • Interesting light mechanic that encourages player to tread carefully and make clever decisions.
  • Badass shooting action filled with ultra badass pixel gore.
  • Cool original soundtrack.
  • Mysterious golden scarab companion.
  • Ominous bastard guardian deep inside.

data.short_description: Lulu’s Temple is a mysterious action-adventure about an archeologist venturing deep inside a horrifying pyramid with only his torch and gun to protect him.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Norwegian*, German*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 860
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains pixel gore, blood and swearing.
